statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, amount, payment_date FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT payment_date, policy_number, amount FROM insurance_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM insurance_payments GROUP BY policy_number;
SELECT * FROM insurance_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, amount FROM insurance_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM insurance_payments GROUP BY policy_number HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_payment, MAX(amount) AS max_payment, MIN(amount) AS min_payment FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT policy_number) AS unique_policies, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM insurance_payments;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM insurance_policies JOIN payments ON insurance_policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder_name, payment_amount FROM insurance_policies INNER JOIN payments ON insurance_policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT policy_holder_name, payment_amount, payment_method FROM insurance_policies INNER JOIN payments ON insurance_policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;

SELECT policy_holder_name, COUNT(payment_id) AS num_payments FROM insurance_policies LEFT JOIN payments ON insurance_policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name HAVING num_payments > 5 ORDER BY num_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, email_address FROM policyholders WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT p.policy_holder_name, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM payments INNER JOIN insurance_policies p ON p.policy_id = payments.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name HAVING total_paid > 5000 ORDER BY total_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount, start_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount < 3000;
SELECT p.policy_holder_name, pm.amount_paid, pm.payment_method FROM insurance_policies p JOIN payments pm ON p.policy_id = pm.policy_id;
SELECT ph.policy_holder_name, ph.email_address, p.premium_amount FROM policyholders ph JOIN insurance_policies p ON ph.policy_holder_name = p.policy_holder_name;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount_paid BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_records;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT policy_name, coverage_amount, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, customer_id, payment_date FROM payment_records WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customers.customer_name, insurance_policies.policy_name FROM customers INNER JOIN insurance_policies ON customers.customer_id = insurance_policies.policy_id;
SELECT payment_date, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments_history GROUP BY payment_date HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT * FROM payment_records PR LEFT JOIN payments_history PH ON PR.record_id = PH.record_id WHERE PH.history_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders ORDER BY holder_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, holder_name, holder_address FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM premiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_phone, policy_type FROM policy_holders JOIN policies ON policy_holders.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT insurer_name, COUNT(*) AS policies_count FROM insurers JOIN policies ON insurers.insurer_id = policies.insurer_id GROUP BY insurer_name ORDER BY policies_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
